subtitle: IV Percentile (52w) — fraction of past days with IV ≤ today.

measures.how_to_read: 0.9 means 90% of days had lower IV; 0.1 means IV is low vs history.
measures.caveats: Sensitive to outliers; rank vs percentile differ slightly.
measures.what_it_measures: Percentile rank of IV vs 52-week history.

assistant_hints: High percentile suggests rich IV; low suggests cheap IV.
Percentile vs rank differ subtly; be consistent in selection.
Outliers skew percentiles — review window and cleaning.
Use with momentum/regime to avoid fighting market direction.
